title: Dwars door Vlaanderen: Powless Stuns Van Aert and Visma-Lease a Bike in Flanders Primer
content:
US sensation Powless outsprints Van Aert after hanging tough with three 'killer bees' in 55km attack.

Read the full article at Dwars door Vlaanderen: Powless Stuns Van Aert and Visma-Lease a Bike in Flanders Primer on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
